name: My Iron Body
description:
On a wasteland, one broken robot just woke up from a long time disabled. His objective is to upgrade his broken parts to get out of the junk yard where he was dumped.

Join this adventure on this platformer metroidvania based game.

Controls: 
A and D (or use the arrows) to move sideways. 
Space to jump.

This game was developed between May 28 and May 30, 2021 for the Just Another Jam #2.
